targets.expr: max by (instance)(sum by(screen, instance) (jmix_ui_screens_seconds_max{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen!~".*Fragment"}))

sum by (screen) (rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen!~".*Fragment"}[5m]))/sum by (screen) (rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="beforeShow", screen!~".*Fragment"}[5m]))

sum by (screen, dataLoader)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="load"}[5m]))/sum by (screen, dataLoader)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="load"}[5m]))

sum by (screen) (rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen="$screen"}[5m]))/sum by(screen) (rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", lifeCycle="beforeShow", screen="$screen"}[5m]))

sum by(lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen="$screen"}[5m]))/ sum by (lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_screens_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen="$screen"}[5m]))

sum by (dataLoader, lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen="$screen"}[5m]))/sum by (dataLoader, lifeCycle)(rate(jmix_ui_data_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", screen="$screen"}[5m]))
